Interface Player


  • public interface Player

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlayerAction getMove(MapItems[][] map, java.util.HashMap<java.awt.Point,Bomb> bombLocations, java.util.HashMap<java.awt.Point,PowerUps> powerUpLocations, Bomber[] playerPositions, java.util.List<java.awt.Point> explosionLocations, int playerIndex, int moveNumber)
      Called whenever a move is requested.
      void newGame(MapItems[][] map, java.util.List<java.awt.Point> blocks, Bomber[] playerPositions, int playerIndex)
      Called when a new game is about to start.

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        void newGame(MapItems[][] map,
           java.util.List<java.awt.Point> blocks,
           Bomber[] playerPositions,
           int playerIndex)
        Called when a new game is about to start.
        Parameters:
        map - the map at the start of the game
        blocks - a list of the position of all the blocks on the map
        playerPositions - player starting positions
        playerIndex - your player index (0= player 1, 1= player 2)

      • getMove

        PlayerAction getMove(MapItems[][] map,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.awt.Point,Bomb> bombLocations,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.awt.Point,PowerUps> powerUpLocations,
                   Bomber[] playerPositions,
                   java.util.List<java.awt.Point> explosionLocations,
                   int playerIndex,
                   int moveNumber)
        Called whenever a move is requested. Everything that is passed in here is for the current turn.
        Parameters:
        map - current game map
        bombLocations - a list of bombs currently on the map No bombs with timeLeft = 0 will be included in this list.
        powerUpLocations - a list of power-ups and their type
        players - both player's current position, and bomb related info
        explosionLocations - a list of explosions currently on the map. By the next getMove call, the list of explosions will be different.
        playerIndex - your player index (0=player 1, 1=player 2)
        moveNumber - Current turn number.
        Returns:
        the PlayerAction that represents the action that the Bomber should carry out in this turn.
